corporateBlock.title: Corporate Overview
corporateBlock.text1: Reli Group s.r.o. is a European company headquartered in the Czech Republic.
corporateBlock.text2: Originally established as a distributor of solar panel solutions, we built our foundation in the highly regulated and competitive energy sector.

strategicBlock.text3: The shift followed clear market insights:
strategicBlock.text4: Leveraging our operational expertise, technology investments, and experience managing large partner networks, we developed Marketplace Reli (www.reli.one), a next-generation marketplace designed to support businesses of all sizes.

valueBlock.title: Value for Sellers
valueBlock.text2: Our goal is to create a marketplace ecosystem where sellers can operate efficiently, scale sustainably, and focus on what they do best - building their business.

visionBlock.title: Our Vision
visionBlock.text1: Reli Group s.r.o. is committed to establishing Reli.one as a leading European digital marketplace built on trust, operational excellence, and business integrity.
visionBlock.text2: We aim to connect businesses, brands, and creators with customers through a platform that reflects professional standards and long-term strategic thinking.

reslexpBlock.title: Reli.one - A Marketplace Built by a Business with Real Experience
reslexpBlock.text1: Our history in the solar energy sector taught us the value of precision, compliance, and reliability.
reslexpBlock.text2: These values now define our marketplace.
reslexpBlock.text3: Sellers who partner with Reli.one gain access to a platform built not on speculation, but on experience, structure, and corporate discipline.

adavantageBlock.title: Reli.one Marketplace
adavantageBlock.text1: Reli.one is a multi-category online marketplace built on principles that reflect our corporate heritage:

block1.title: Operational Reliability
block1.desc: A robust platform designed with the same precision and process orientation used in industrial distribution.

block2.title: Transparent Business Environment
block2.desc: Clear conditions, predictable fees, and no unexpected changes. Sellers operate with confidence and long-term visibility.

block3.title: Scalable Digital Infrastructure
block3.desc: Secure payments, automated systems, detailed analytics, and integrated business tools - all designed for professional use.

block4.title: Partnership-Driven Approach
block4.desc: We build long-term relationships with sellers, supporting their growth and treating them as strategic partners, not just platform participants.
